title: A Whippoorwill in the Woods - "what's disjunct"

content.question: In line 26, "what's disjunct" refers to something that

choices.label: cannot be seen by most observers
stands outside the purely natural world
faces a constant threat of extinction
is not incorporated in a larger entity

content.answer: is not incorporated in a larger entity

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
